Author: fishonthesun
Text: A while ago I found a PDF from an exercise science study that contains the mathematical formula to figuring out how many cals you burn from types of exercises. I think if you Google search 2011 Compendium of Physical Activities Reference List Category 15- Sports, you'll find the PDF. there is almost no chance ballet isnt on there. It has everything. It even has "ice fishing."  I hope that helps. And you should definitely up your calorie intake, even I'd you dont continue with ballet. Your Mooscles will continue to be sore for a long time if you dont get enough nutrition to heal them.  Good luck!!
